definitions.definition: A comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin , Piedmont , Italy .
A comune of Verona , Veneto , Italy , scene for the Battle of Rivoli in 1797.
A township in Mercer County , Illinois , United States .

main_definition: A comune in the Metropolitan City of Turin , Piedmont , Italy .
